not tracked not covered covered 
package tsidcachecheckpoint

import (
        "sync"
        "time"

        "github.com/signalfuse/sfxinternalgo/sbingest/tsidcache"
        "github.com/signalfx/golib/distconf"
)

// DiskCheckpoint is what the checkpointer uses to run perioid checkpoints on
type DiskCheckpoint interface {
        CheckpointDisk(lastStats *tsidcache.HitsMisses) (currentStats *tsidcache.HitsMisses)
        LoadStats(storeInto *tsidcache.HitsMisses) *tsidcache.HitsMisses
}

// TSIDCheckpointer will checkpoint the on disk cache for a TSID cache based upon the hitrate
// of the TSID cache
type TSIDCheckpointer struct {
        toCheckpoint            DiskCheckpoint
        spawnedGoroutinesClosed sync.WaitGroup
        config                  *Config
        closeChan               chan struct{}
}

// Config controls how TSIDCheckpointer runs
type Config struct {
        CheckpointInterval *distconf.Duration
        TimeAfter          func(d time.Duration) <-chan time.Time
}

// Load the cache config from distconf
func (d *Config) Load(conf *distconf.Config) {
        d.CheckpointInterval = conf.Duration("sf.sbingest.tsidcache.diskcheckpointing", time.Minute*5)
        d.TimeAfter = time.After
}

// New creates a new TSIDCheckpointer
func New(toCheckpoint DiskCheckpoint, config *Config) *TSIDCheckpointer {
        ret := TSIDCheckpointer{
                toCheckpoint: toCheckpoint,
                config:       config,
                closeChan:    make(chan struct{}),
        }
        ret.spawnedGoroutinesClosed.Add(1)
        go ret.diskCheckpointing(config)
        return &ret
}

func (i *TSIDCheckpointer) diskCheckpointing(config *Config) {
        defer i.spawnedGoroutinesClosed.Done()
        lastStats := i.toCheckpoint.LoadStats(&tsidcache.HitsMisses{}) // (&hitsMisses{}).load(&i.stats)
        for {
                select {
                case <-i.closeChan:
                        return
                case <-config.TimeAfter(config.CheckpointInterval.Get()):
                        lastStats = i.toCheckpoint.CheckpointDisk(lastStats)
                }
        }
}

// Close this service and end any waiting goroutines
func (i *TSIDCheckpointer) Close() error {
        close(i.closeChan)
        i.spawnedGoroutinesClosed.Wait()
        return nil
}
